value.title: AlphaICs gets long-awaited AI Gluon chips fabbed by TSMC
value.excerpt: AlphaICs says it has put its first AI chip from design to production on a shoestring budget of $10m in venture-capital funding. The four-year-old startup on Monday announced it was sampling the chip, which is called Gluon, to customers for evaluation.
